subject: Hockey, Ice
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Tim Thomas stopped 33 shots and Glen Murray and Chuck Kobasew scored power-play goals last night for the Boston Bruins, who ended a 10-game winless streak on Long Island with a 3-1 victory over the Islanders.
snippet: Tim Thomas stopped 33 shots and Glen Murray and Chuck Kobasew scored power-play goals last night for the Boston Bruins, who ended a 10-game winless streak on Long Island with a 3-1 victory over the Islanders.
